name: Center of Global Consciousness
goal: The Center of Global Consciousness (CGC) is dedicated to the eradication of all chemical, biological, psychosocial and economic methods of population control used by the United Nations and governments around the world since 1945 to achieve the demographic objectives of the Global Depopulation Policy. The CGC seeks to replace the current covert, eugenic and genocidal methods of population control with overt legislation approved by voters' informed consent and passed through democratic processes.
interests: Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health
euInitiatives:
Legislative files followed:
Biocides Regulation
Organic Foods Regulation

Initiatives put forward:
Legislating a population control law with three aspects: replacement level fertility, assisted suicide, optimal population levels
